line.comment: * only the early game search mission. Lategame event is in SWM3.Ability.KatanaFleet

* KatanaMissionProgress 1:first research project unlocked 2:first ship appear ready to be claimed 3:first ship claimed, second research project unlocked 4:second ships appear ready to be claimed 5:claimed any second ship -> mission complete
*first research project complete, ship appears in neutral sector

line.text: 'There is an abandoned Katana Dreadnought in an Unknown sector.'

line.comment: *second project completed, two more ships appear in a Sith sector

line.text: 'There are two more Katana Dreadnoughts in a Sith sector.'

line.comment: *after claiming any of the two second ships. completes mission. Mandos receive 3 Katana Dreadnoughts in a non Sith sector and use them for piracy

sval.val: There is an abandoned Katana Dreadnought in an Unknown sector.
Decrypt the Katana fleet code fragment.
There are two more Katana Dreadnoughts in a Sith sector.
only the early game search mission. Lategame event is in SWM3.Ability.KatanaFleet

KatanaMissionProgress 1:first research project unlocked 2:first ship appear ready to be claimed 3:first ship claimed, second research project unlocked 4:second ships appear ready to be claimed 5:claimed any second ship -> mission complete
first research project complete, ship appears in neutral sector
second project completed, two more ships appear in a Sith sector
after claiming any of the two second ships. completes mission. Mandos receive 3 Katana Dreadnoughts in a non Sith sector and use them for piracy
